1.name: Sherlock Jr.
1.description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

2.name: The Thief of Bagdad
2.description: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.

3.name: Greed
3.description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

4.name: He Who Gets Slapped
4.description: A bitter clown endeavors to rescue the young woman he loves from the lecherous count who once betrayed him.

5.name: Die Nibelungen: Siegfried
5.description: Siegfried, son of King Sigmund, hears of the beautiful sister of Gunter, King of Worms, Kriemhild. On his way to Worms, he kills a dragon and finds a treasure, the Hort. He helps Gunther to...                See full summary »

6.name: Der letzte Mann
6.description: An aging doorman, after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious Hotel is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbours and society.

7.name: Peter Pan
7.description: Peter Pan enters the nursery of the Darling children and, with the help of fairy dust, leads them off to Never Never Land, where they meet the nefarious Captain Hook.

8.name: The Navigator
8.description: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

9.name: Das Wachsfigurenkabinett
9.description: A wax museum hires a writer to give the sculptures stories. The writer imagines himself and the museum owner's daughter in the stories.

10.name: Die Nibelungen: Kriemhilds Rache

11.name: The Iron Horse
11.description: After witnessing the murder of his father by a renegade as a boy, the grown-up Brandon helps to realize his father's dream of a transcontinental railway.

12.name: Orlacs Hände
12.description: A world-famous pianist loses both hands in an accident. When new hands are grafted on, he doesn't know they once belonged to a murderer.

13.name: Girl Shy
13.description: A shy, young man, who is completely incapable of talking to women, decides to write a book that details to other bachelors how to find a girlfriend.

14.name: Aelita

15.name: L'inhumaine
15.description: Claire Lescot is a famous first lady. All men want to be loved by her and among them is the young scientist Einar Norsen. When she mocks at him, he leaves her house with the declared intention to kill himself.

16.name: Dante's Inferno

17.description: Professor Stock and his wife Mizzi are always bickering. Mizzi tries to seduce Dr. Franz Braun, the new husband of her good friend Charlotte. Dr. Braun's colleague, Dr. Mueller, who has had...                See full summary »

19.name: Michael
19.description: Triangle story: painter, his young male model, unscrupulous princess.

20.name: Die Stadt ohne Juden
20.description: Jews are expelled from the city of Utopia.

21.name: Neobychainye priklyucheniya mistera Vesta v strane bolshevikov

28.name: Quo Vadis?
28.description: Watch the Apostles and other followers like Saul preach the gospel and spread the message of love and hope in this high quality entertaining animated feature for your kids and family.

29.name: Gösta Berlings saga
29.description: A drunkard priest who has been cast out by his community struggles to atone and regain his honour and dignity.

30.name: Captain Blood

31.description: A young man, who has vowed never to marry and doesn't particularly like children, is left in charge of his two very young nieces. At first they drive him to distraction, but then he begins ...                See full summary »

32.name: Kean
32.description: When a famous Shakespearean actor falls in love with a woman above his station, his professional and personal life begin to crumble.

37.name: The Whipping Boss
37.description: Prison inmates are leased by the state to a lumber company, which makes them work under atrocious and dangerous conditions and treats them as virtual slave laborers. Based on a real-life incident that happened in Florida.

39.name: Carl XII:s kurir
39.description: After the battle in Bender, the King Karl XII appoints the brave horseman Axel Roos to bring an urgent message to the council in Stockholm through the hostile Europe.

40.name: America
40.description: The story of a family caught up in the American Revolutionary War.

41.name: Die Finanzen des Großherzogs

42.name: The Sea Hawk
42.description: A wrongly convicted English gentleman goes from galley slave to pirate captain.

45.name: Isn't Life Wonderful
45.description: A family of Polish refugees tries to survive in post-World War I Germany. For a while it seems that they are making it, but soon the economic and political deterioration in the country begins to take their toll.

46.name: The King of Wild Horses
46.description: A stallion known as "The Black" is the leader of a band of wild horses. A cowboy is determined to capture and break him.

48.name: Three Women
48.description: A frivolous middle aged socialite is suddenly put upon to have her daughter live with her. Her conniving paramour dumps her for the daughter, leaving the young boyfriend crushed.
